Events that occurred on 1 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends a medical board examination. He spends some time at Hornsea Musketry Camp.
1917 - Actress Pauline Letts is born.
1946 - Actress Nellie Bellflower is born.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Donna Sadlier.
2004 - There and Back Again: In the Footsteps of J.R.R. Tolkien's England is published.
2007 - The History of The Hobbit volume 1: Mr. Baggins is published.
2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Doom of the Last-King" is released in Europe.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2942:
Bilbo and Gandalf reach Rivendell after their adventures at the Lonely Mountain.
T.A. 3018:
Aragorn and Gandalf meet at Sarn Ford. Gandalf tells Aragorn of Frodo's plan to leave the Shire.
T.A. 3019:
Crowning of King Elessar. He bids Faramir to remain Steward of Gondor.
Ambassadors of the Kingdom Under the Mountain and the Kingdom of Dale are in Gondor for the coronation.
Elrond and Arwen set out from Rivendell.
T.A. 3020:
Samwise Gamgee marries Rose Cotton.
